name: Galactic Trader
description: A space-themed strategy game where players travel to different planets to buy and sell resources, upgrade their spaceship, and compete against other traders.

name: Escape the Island
description: A survival game where players are stranded on a deserted island and must gather resources, build shelter, and fend off dangerous wildlife to survive and find a way to escape.

name: Dungeon Quest
description: A fantasy RPG where players create a character and explore a series of dark and dangerous dungeons, battling monsters, collecting treasure, and leveling up their skills and abilities.

name: Space Invaders
description: A space-themed strategy game where players travel to different planets to buy and sell resources, upgrade their spaceship, and compete against other traders.
